title: Such allotted public spaces shall be developed and maintained by the concerned Electricity Distribution Company at its own cost, as directed by the Commissioner
clause_text: Such allotted public spaces shall be developed and maintained by the concerned Electricity Distribution Company at its own cost, as directed by the Commissioner.
